sports.first: Success is no accident. It is hard work, perseverance, learning, studying, sacrifice and most of all, love of what you are doing.
sports.second: Champions keep playing until they get it right.
sports.three: The harder the battle, the sweeter the victory.
sports.four: Your body can stand almost anything. It's your mind that you have to convince.
sports.five: Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
sports.six: The only way to achieve the impossible is to believe it is possible.
sports.seven: Strength does not come from winning. Your struggles develop your strengths.
sports.eight: It's not whether you get knocked down, it's whether you get up.
sports.nine: You miss 100% of the shots you don't take.
sports.ten: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.
sports.eleven: The difference between a successful person and others is not a lack of strength, not a lack of knowledge, but rather a lack in will.
sports.twelve: The future depends on what you do today.
sports.thirteen: I don't count my sit-ups; I only start counting when it starts hurting because they’re the only ones that count.
sports.fourteen: The pain you feel today will be the strength you feel tomorrow.
sports.fifteen: Success usually comes to those who are too busy to be looking for it.
sports.sixteen: It's not about the destination, it's about the journey.
sports.seventeen: Push yourself because no one else is going to do it for you.
sports.nineteen: The only bad workout is the one that didn't happen.

love.first: Love is not about how much you say 'I love you,' but how much you prove that it's true.
love.second: The best thing to hold onto in life is each other.
love.three: Love is composed of a single soul inhabiting two bodies.
love.four: In the arithmetic of love, one plus one equals everything.
love.five: The greatest happiness of life is the conviction that we are loved.
love.six: Dream big and dare to fail.
love.seven: Love is an endless act of forgiveness. A tender look which becomes a habit.
love.eight: Love is not something you find. Love is something that finds you.
love.nine: To love and be loved is to feel the sun from both sides.
love.ten: Love is like the wind, you can't see it but you can feel it.
love.eleven: Challenges are what make life interesting and overcoming them is what makes life meaningful.
love.twelve: Love is the only force capable of transforming an enemy into a friend.
love.thirteen: Love is the master key that opens the gates of happiness.
love.fourteen: Love isn't something you find. Love is something that finds you.
love.fifteen: The greatest gift you can give someone is your time, your attention, your love, and your concern.
love.sixteen: Being deeply loved by someone gives you strength, while loving someone deeply gives you courage.
love.seventeen: Love is not about possession. Love is about appreciation.
love.eighteen: Love doesn't make the world go 'round. Love is what makes the ride worthwhile.
love.nineteen: A successful marriage requires falling in love many times, always with the same person.
love.twenty: Love is the beauty of the soul.
love.twenty_one: Love is when the other person's happiness is more important than your own

positiveThinking.first: Your mind is a powerful thing. When you fill it with positive thoughts, your life will start to change.
positiveThinking.second: A positive attitude can really make dreams come true - it did for me.
positiveThinking.three: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
positiveThinking.four: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will.
positiveThinking.six: When you change your thoughts, you change your world.
positiveThinking.seven: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
positiveThinking.eight: In the middle of every difficulty lies opportunity.
positiveThinking.nine: Optimism is the faith that leads to achievement

passion.first: Passion is energy. Feel the power that comes from focusing on what excites you.
passion.second: Follow your passion. It will lead you to your purpose.
passion.three: Passion is the genesis of genius.
passion.four: Passion is the driving force that brings dreams to reality.
passion.five: Without passion, you don’t have energy; without energy, you have nothing. Nothing great in the world has been accomplished without passion.
passion.six: Passion is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful.
passion.seven: Passion first and everything will fall into place.
passion.eight: Passion is the bridge that takes you from pain to change.
passion.nine: Follow your passion, be prepared to work hard and sacrifice, and, above all, don't let anyone limit your dreams.
passion.ten: Do what you love, and you will never have to work a day in your life.
passion.eleven: Passion is the fire that drives us to express who we really are.
passion.twelve: Passion is the oxygen of the soul.
passion.thirteen: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
passion.fourteen: Passion is not limited to a single activity; it's an attitude that influences everything you do.
passion.fifteen: Passion is the fuel in the engine of your life.
passion.sixteen: Passion is the elixir that turns the ordinary into the extraordinary.
passion.seventeen: Passion is the spark that ignites the fire of creativity.
passion.nineteen: Passion is the heartbeat of a purposeful life.
